query: Can you create a 5-day travel itinerary for 2 individuals departing from Charlotte and planning to visit 2 cities in New York from March 9th to March 13th, 2022? Our budget is set at $3,700. Regarding dining, we have a preference for French and Chinese cuisine. We will also need accommodations that can cater to our stay.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[New York,Buffalo]
